message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start us off.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think a 65/35 split is a fair starting point. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, time is ticking and this money is losing value for me.  I'm willing to be generous, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle. 65/35 is my final offer.
